name: Lux Machina
description:
28th GM48 (Ranked 10/53) Theme: Companion

This game was an entry for the 28th GM48. 

View original submission here: https://gm48.net/game/1048/lux-machina

The Jam Version of the game is the exact same as the one on the gm48 page. The other has some changes.

Changes from the Jam Version
  • Revamped Controls
  • Changed tutorial text to fit new controls
  • Added a missing collision
  • Removed the debug keys
  • Typo fixed
Story

In Lux Machina you need to solve puzzles that will lead you to, you guessed it, more puzzles!

Press buttons and control lasers!

Since you have no arms you will have little robot buddies that will help you on your journey, but they aren't the only ones that are involved, a strange voice is also present.
